episode: A recent time in which I felt confident was when I took my cousin to the gym for the first time to teach him how to engage in strength training.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: A time in which I felt confident was when I went to the gym with my cousin to teach him how to engage in strength training.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! It must have felt great to share your knowledge and skills.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it did. It felt that I was helping someone else take the first steps to improve their life and physical health

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a wonderful feeling. You're making a positive impact!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you. What ways do you think I could make sure they stay committed to it and not get easily discouraged?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Encourage setting small goals and celebrate progress.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Good idea. Do you recommend that I give them physical gifts for reaching goals and milestones or just verbal praise?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Both can be effective!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks. I really hope he sticks with it as he told me how he wants to become stronger and get healthier to lose weight

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great motivation!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I wonder how many people start to work out and then stop due to lack of motivation and confidence?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It happens often, but support can make a big difference.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I agree. This is what allows me to be confident is my 3 or 4 years of training on a consistent basis.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's impressive dedication!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It feels good to share what you have learned with others and allow themselves to grow and see something inside of themselves they didn't know they had.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, it's rewarding!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What do you believe builds confidence in areas of activities over time?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Practice and positive reinforcement.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Do you feel that without that it is not possible to build confidence or it would just take longer?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It would likely take longer.
